items.name: Potato Chip
items.description: Salty, crispy, goodness.

items.name: Bobby
items.description: Won't someone be his friend?

items.name: Bread Person
items.description: What is up with this mysterious, sentient bread?

items.name: Skullington
items.description: This skull is looking for his dad!

items.name: Tooth or Horn or Something
items.description: You're not quite sure what it is, but it's sharp!

items.name: Coin
items.description: A coin saved is a coin earned!

items.name: Heart
items.description: Get this back inside your body!

items.name: Sad Picture
items.description: Don't look at it too long, or you might start crying.

items.name: Drop of Blood
items.description: What happens when you drink it?

items.name: Funshroom
items.description: Eating this mushroom will make you see the world differently!

items.name: Spotshroom
items.description: They say a mean, old dog is looking for these!

items.name: Key
items.description: This opens a locked something-or-other!

items.name: Giant Coffee Bean
items.description: Did you know that coffee beans are fruits?

items.name: Old Tin Can
items.description: Kick that thing!

items.name: Grandma's Ring
items.description: She's been looking all over for that!

items.name: Glass of Milk
items.description: Whether it's half empty or half full, this glass has milk in it.

items.name: Feather
items.description: At least, it's supposed to be a feather.

items.name: Leaf
items.description: Where did it come from?

items.name: Jumpshroom
items.description: Jump on these bad boys for a good time!

items.name: Approximately
items.description: Neither here nor there, as the kids are saying these days.

items.name: Divide
items.description: ...and conquer!

items.name: Scary Right Hand
items.description: If this game weren't limited to two colors, you bet this hand would be red!

items.name: Just a Flower
items.description: That's all there is to this.

items.name: Love Letter
items.description: Tell them how you really feel!

items.name: One of Those Jelly Filled Cookies
Yin
items.description: Dark shit.

items.name: Yang
items.description: Light shit.

items.name: Maybe a Pecan
items.description: If you're allergic to nuts, then don't bother.

items.name: AA Battery
items.description: Only one.

items.name: Metal Sphere
items.description: Don't let Jerry choke on this.

items.name: Jerry
items.description: Just leave him alone, okay?

items.name: Question
items.description: You can't know everything.

items.name: F-Hole
items.description: Don't make it inappropriate.

items.name: Floppy Disc
items.description: Back in my day...

items.name: Evil Spiral
items.description: Ew, would you look at that thing!?

items.name: Just Bread
items.description: I bet this will heal you.

items.name: Theodore
items.description: He's a little grumpy, but it's not your fault.

items.name: Cosmic Gemstone
items.description: Whatever you do, don't eat it!

items.name: Portal Key
items.description: Woah, what?!

items.name: Chess Board
items.description: ...not checkers.

items.name: Star
items.description: Yes, you really can own a star.

items.name: Star Sticker
items.description: Good job!

items.name: Star Replica
items.description: Almost as good as the real thing.

items.name: Outlet
items.description: Get some power!

items.name: Benevolent Spiral
items.description: Aw, it's so cute.

items.name: Another Key
items.description: This key seems special.

items.name: Portal to Another World
items.description: Where did you go?

items.name: Map
items.description: Now you know where you go!

items.name: Pooch
items.description: I don't really like dogs, so you can have this one.

items.name: Disc
items.description: Maybe the dog will like it.

items.name: Handheld Video Game Thingy
items.description: Retro, baby.

items.name: Tortilla Chip
items.description: No salsa!?

items.name: Vengeful Left Hand
items.description: Don't tell the right hand what you're doing.

items.name: Fire
items.description: This will warm you right up!

items.name: Walkie-Talkie
items.description: Are you reading me?

items.name: Stemless Leaf
items.description: They're all the rage these days.

items.name: Bone
items.description: It's just a bone... or is it?

items.name: Rake
items.description: It's just a rake.

items.name: Stone
items.description: It's just a rock.

items.name: The Watcher from the Other Side
items.description: It will destroy you in an instance but it is the key to solving this whole thing!

items.name: Sunglasses
items.description: Cool kid.

items.name: Lightbulb
items.description: Ah ha!

items.name: Ace of Spades
items.description: Slip this up your sleeve for later use.

items.name: Die
items.description: Take your chances!
